backend/main.mo: Defines a large Mood variant with text conversion plus supporting types and an actor skeleton for profile, status, and authorization logic.
backend/migration.mo: Contains old-to-new data model definitions and structures used for migrating mood enums and stored actor state to the updated schema.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting required frontend mood catalog updates and the affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing recent UI, routing, and interaction changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining color variables, themes, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React application and loads main.tsx.
frontend/index.ts: Empty placeholder TypeScript file with no implementation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, theming, sound context, and the full TanStack Router route tree for public and authenticated app pages.
frontend/src/components/app/AppFooter.ts: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Header component showing app title, journal button, theme toggle, and a user menu with profile and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: Defines the main app layout with header, bottom nav, journal overlays, and redirects on logout.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Renders a bottom navigation bar with icons and unread notification badges.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Shows a floating action button for creating a new journal entry when visible.
frontend/src/components/app/ThemeToggleB: Button that toggles between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wraps children with auth loading and login handling, showing login if user is unauthenticated.
Displays the login UI with branding, randomized copy, and login action handling.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Shows a generated summary of circle energy based on recent posts.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Lists circle members with profiles, pulse scores, and remove-member actions.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Form for joining a circle using a share code with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Displays pending join requests with accept and decline actions and profile details.
frontend/src/components/circle/SafePeopl: Manages selecting up to two Safe People, showing candidates and recommendations, and handling add/remove actions with backend updates.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: Displays and edits the user’s share code with copy, edit, and save actions tied to backend updates.
frontend/src/components/common/IconActio: Reusable button that shows an icon with a tooltip, wrapping the standard Button component.
frontend/src/components/common/Progressi: Collapsible UI component that reveals hidden content when triggered.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: Shows a dismissible daily mood check‑in reminder card that navigates users to the check‑in page.
frontend/src/components/feed/SilentSigna: Displays a silent signal with author info, timestamp, and mood styling, indicating if it’s the user’s own signal.
Lets users send predefined silent signals to their Safe People, handling send states and setup requirements.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: Date picker for journal entries using a popover calendar, preventing selection of future dates.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Shows journal entries for a selected date with create, delete, and read‑only rules based on date context.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: Displays a right-side sheet for journaling with date selection, rules disclosure, and entries panel, resetting to today when opened if requested.
frontend/src/components/profile/MicroAct: Generates and displays micro‑action suggestions based on mood history, falling back to guidance if insufficient data.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Analyzes mood history over a selected timeframe, showing trends, distributions, and top moods, and includes micro‑actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Lets users preview, select, or upload avatars with validation, updating the parent on changes and managing preview URLs.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Gates profile-dependent content, handling loading, errors, setup flow, retry, and logout.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Step‑based onboarding dialog collecting user profile details and saving them on completion.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundEffec: Plays sounds when new notifications, feed items, join requests, or circle members appear, ignoring initial loads.
frontend/src/components/status/AudienceS: UI component for choosing post audience and optionally selecting specific circle members, excluding the current user.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: Lets users add predefined or custom context tags with validation and soft limits.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Searchable mood selector that groups moods by category and highlights the selected mood.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Modal prompting users to add a private note with optional micro‑action suggestions.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Displays a mood status post with author info, mood styling, timestamp, and optional privacy indicators.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Provides predefined context tags and limits for custom tag creation.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Contains core app promise and boundary text for UI messaging.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Holds rotating login screen text and a function to pick random phrases.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Defines all mood options with labels, emojis, and categories.
frontend/src/constants/sounds.ts: Lists sound asset paths and the sound cue type.
frontend/src/constants/systemAvatars.ts: Defines a fixed list of system avatar IDs and asset paths plus a helper to look up an avatar path by ID.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: Provides a React context for showing or hiding the floating journal UI with simple visibility controls.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: Implements a context controlling the journal overlay state, including opening with optional reset and closing.
frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx: Manages global sound settings, initializes audio assets, unlocks audio on interaction, and exposes sound‑playing functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to add error tracking and a refetch mechanism for actor initialization failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions via Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting journal entries through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Builds a user's recent mood history from feed items filtered by timeframe, author, and type.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines profile, avatar, feed, connection, and other backend queries and mutations using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: Re-exports the sound context hook for convenient access to sound controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables plus safe‑area padding utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Renders the main Circle page with tabs for members, requests, joining, and safe people plus circle energy data.
frontend/src/pages/CirclesImInPage.tsx: Shows a list of circle owners the user belongs to, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ClosestConnectionsPag: Displays ranked closest connections with avatars and optional explanation via progressive disclosure.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Form for composing a status with mood, tags, audience selection, and posting logic.
frontend/src/pages/DailyCheckInPage.tsx: Daily check‑in flow to post a mood/status with audience controls, guard checks, and mood history integration.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the user feed with refresh, reminder, composer, and dynamic rendering of status or silent-signal items.
frontend/src/pages/HomeRoutePage.tsx: Routes users to public or authenticated home views depending on identity initialization and login state.
frontend/src/pages/InviteCodeAuthStepPag: Handles invite-code-based login flow, storing codes, triggering authentication, and joining circles after login.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows unread/read notifications with ability to mark items or all as read and navigate to linked statuses.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits user profile details, avatar, preferences, and pulse score with save and cancel flows.
frontend/src/pages/PublicHomePage.tsx: Public landing page allowing invite code entry or account creation with informational sections.
frontend/src/pages/StartAuthPage.tsx: Simple login/create-account start page that redirects on successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single status with loading/error states, permission handling, and navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Provides helpers to calculate age, format dates for input, and parse date strings into bigint timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/audience.ts: Builds a unique audience list for a post, ensuring the author is always included.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Analyzes recent posts to classify circle mood/vibe and generate non-clinical summary text using stable seeded phrase selection.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Normalizes and validates custom context tags, checking length, emptiness, and duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInEntry.ts: Manages a sessionStorage flag indicating one-time entry into daily check‑in mode.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCodeSession.ts: Stores, retrieves, normalizes, and clears invite codes in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/microActions.ts: Generates micro‑action suggestions based on recent mood patterns and context tags using a conservative ruleset.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Analyzes mood history to compute distribution, trends, concern level, and guidance with a built‑in disclaimer.
frontend/src/utils/moodColors.ts: Maps mood categories to Tailwind color and gradient class sets for consistent UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Handles once‑per‑day mood reminder visibility using localStorage keyed by local date.
frontend/src/utils/profileAvatar.ts: Utilities for deriving avatar image URLs, validating avatar files, converting uploads to bytes, and revoking blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a 6‑character alphanumeric share code using a reduced, unambiguous character set.
frontend/src/utils/soundPreferences.ts: Gets and sets a boolean sound‑enabled preference in localStorage with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Helpers for converting between bigint nanosecond timestamps and Date, checking date ranges, and formatting dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters (including hash), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata including high‑level summary, architectural notes, and known issues for the CloseCircle app.
